articles.author: Aleksandar Gilbert
articles.description: Terra is forking its blockchain and ditching UST, the algorithmic stablecoin that collapsed in dramatic fashion two weeks ago.
articles.title: Forked Terra Blockchain To Launch On Friday

articles.author: yyctrader
articles.description: Crypto users are speculating that Optimism could drop its OP token as early as tomorrow.
articles.title: BREAKING: Optimism’s $OP Token Could Be Imminent

articles.author: DappRadar
articles.description: This special report from DappRadar compares the 2018 crypto winter with the current six-month bear trend in an attempt to assess whether a crypto winter is ahead, and what the crypto industry can expect in the upcoming months.
articles.title: Contrasting The 2022 Market Crash To 2018’s Crypto Winter Crypto winter is a prolonged period characterized by a sustained and general drop in the price of cryptocurrencies which also hinders the enthusiasm for the industry. Is winter coming?

articles.author: Owen Fernau
articles.description: PoolTogether hopes to raise money for ongoing legal expenses through the sale of 'Pooly' NFTs.
articles.title: PoolTogether Launches NFT Sale to Fund Ongoing Litigation

articles.author: Jason Levin
articles.description:
A hacker stole Seth Green’s Bored Ape just weeks before the NFT was set to star in a TV show the Family Guy actor had written about the JPEG. But the show could air even if Green can’t get it back, Jordan Teague, co-founder of web3 law firm The Antifirm, told The Defiant. Green said …
  Seth Green Could Air TV Show Without Stolen Ape, Lawyer Says Read More »
articles.title: Seth Green Could Air TV Show Without Stolen Ape, Lawyer Says
